text: Jazy Game Reserve is a reserve located in a flood plain of Jazy River of Osh Province of Kyrgyzstan. It was established in 1975 to conserve flood plain reed-sandthorn brushwoods and wetlands, serving breeding areas for pheasant, and wintering ground for water-fowl birds. The reserve occupies 5,000 hectares. ==References== Category:Protected areas of Kyrgyzstan Category:Protected areas established in 1975
title: Jazy Game Reserve
